thread.title: Liberals slam SNL for 'sexist' skit parodying Conway | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Liberals slam SNL for 'sexist' skit parodying Conway | Daily Mail Online

author: Ariel Zilber For Dailymail.Com
title: Liberals slam SNL for 'sexist' skit parodying Conway | Daily Mail Online
text: SNL comes under fire from liberals claiming Fatal Attraction skit portraying Kellyanne Conway as violent and unhinged was 'sexist' and 'unfair to a wife and mother' Saturday Night Live has poked fun at President Donald Trump and his administration, igniting criticism from conservatives Now liberals are upset with NBC's hit variety show after it aired a skit Saturday featuring Kellyanne Conway The sketch is a parody of the hit film Fatal Attraction with Conway playing a jilted lover who tries to seduce CNN's Jake Tapper The skit was denounced as sexist by critics of Conway Others say Conway's role in defending Trump's past behavior with women makes her fair game Published: 01:04 GMT, 13 February 2017 | Updated: 05:54 GMT, 13 February 2017 445 shares
